product_name: Moving Comfort Luna Sports Bra - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Luna Sports Bra offers enduring support from an all-day style that provides shape and a smooth, no-show look under your tee. Seam-free molded cups encapsulate for extra support and shaping. Moderate-contour cups give shape, modesty and maximum moisture transfer. Bonded areas offer less bulk and smooth, no-chafe comfort. Back adjustable straps provide a custom fit. Front mesh zone adds ventilation to keep you cool. Adjustable back closure makes it easy to get the Moving Comfort Luna Sports Bra on and off. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Luna Sports Bra offers enduring support from an all-day style that provides shape and a smooth, no-show look under your tee.
